sub_title: Co-Founder, former CEO and shareholder at CFM Pharma & Holding B.V.
summary:
Jos Fleskens: Co - Founder and former CEO ( 2007 - 2018 ) of CFM Pharma & CFM Holding BV, a private Dutch pharmaceutical company with a patented tissue protection and tissue repair technology platform. This platform covers the intravenous administration of VANADIS® an Organic Vanadium (IV+) Compound of which the beneficial effects have been described in several scientific publications. 

Preclinical data of CFM’s drug compound VANADIS® have demonstrated:
1: excellent results in preventing ischemic / reperfusion  injury, over 40% reduction of infarct size in Myocardial Infarction, 
2: 90% prevention of tissue damage in Burns, 
3: proven protection characteristics of Kidneys in Trauma setting. 

The preferred vanadium compound VANADIS® (bis(maltolato)oxovanadium (BMOV)) has a widely known safety profile. 

Major Acomplishments during this period:
After years of persistence and focus, CFM Pharma has been taken to a higher level, which has resulted in a significant step forward that brings a successful completion and exit a lot closer - this under “the R&D banner” of Professor Li Ming Gan - VP R&D cardiology - AstraZeneca.

Professor Li Ming Gan has joined CFM as Technical Board Director, he will managing the work within the cardiovascular field regarding the phase 2 study.

This has resulted that CFM Pharma ( as 2nd foreign company ) has been admitted to AstraZeneca's Bio Venture Hub in Sweden, and move to, and open a CFM Pharma office, in Gothenburg in Sweden.

Company status;
• Preclinical studys required for phase 1 - completed
• Clinical phase I ( Vanadis tested in healthy volunteers) - completed
• Development of synthesized production formula - completed
• Registration of new patents and patent strategy - completed
• Protocols for starting phase 2 studies - completed
• Strengthen CFM board with Key Opinion Leaders - completed
• Strengthen CFM board with strong Technical Expertise -  completed
• Leifeng Cheng: ( AstraZeneca ) has joined CFM as Project Director,  Managing pre-clinical and 
   clinical research in the field of heart failure.
• Professor Rehder worldwide recognized Vanadium expert joined CFM’s Scientific team - completed
• Coorporation with Centres of Exellence in: Cardiology - Burns - Vascular microcirculation
• CFM VANADIS study established- with Centers of Exellence, UMC Leiden & Karlinski Gothenburg
• Study published in the; International Journal of Molecular Sciences ( high ranking ) 
• Private investments attracted and STAK established,
• Able to collect grants and investment capital - on - going process

education.field_of_study: University Hospital Utrecht ( UMC ) Topic: Hospital Management & Organisation

profile_positions.description: After being semi - retired and CEO of CFM Pharma BV for 11 years, I transferred my activities within CFM Pharma to the next generation and therefore have time to do other things, with a strong preference for Biotech and even more for Medtech.
profile_positions.title: Co-Founder / shareholder

profile_positions.description:
Biographical Sketch:
Name: Jos Fleskens, BA: Former CEO and Co-founder of CFM Pharma & Holding B.V.
He was able to make CFM visible and was heavily involved by the admission of CFM to the AstraZeneca BioVentureHub in Sweden, which has resulted in a relocation to/ and opening of the Gothenburg CFM office in August 2018. 

He was formerly CEO of GHO Holding, GHO Clinic ( currently, Hair Science Institute ) and GHO Pharma, a R&D company in inflammation of tissue injury. During this period he was responsible for collecting Investment Capital, Marketing, Business Development, IP, this in corporation with ABN-AMRO Bank Participations Life Science. 

GHO received an award for being the “Most Innovative Life Sciences Company” by LIOF, a Dutch Province VC Company. 

Mr. Fleskens has over 20 years experience in the medical device and life sciences industry and holds a Hospital Management Degree ( BA ) at The Academy of The Hague.

Before CFM Pharma he worked in the cardiovascular and heamodynamic field in different European management positions, at companies like: Edwards Life Sciences, Baxter and Pulsion, he was accountable for: Education, S&M, Managing P&Ls and Business Development strategy, for introducing of High-Tech Products to Mainstream Customers 

Manager Europe 
At Norian Corporation, a start - up orthopedic device company in biomaterials, he was accountable for B&D and establishing the European commercialization of Norian SRS, an Injectable Calcium Phosphate bone Cement. Responsible in the pre launch roll out for Norian SRS in the field of Orthopedics and Traumatology. The strategy of Norian's Head Office US was heavily influenced and guided by the positive results achieved in Europe, what resulted in a sale to Synthes, a global player in Orthopedics.
 
At Baxter he was BUM Critical Care Devision and member of the European Medical Critical Care Counsel group, who was responsible for product development, defining European Commercialization and Marketing Strategies.
profile_positions.title: CEO - CFM Pharma & Holding B.V.

profile_positions.description: Established Molar, at request of  The ANT ( The Dutch dentist Association ). Developing strong competitive and innovative products in the field of dentists.

profile_positions.description: Transformation from a production company to a Business Development Company with a strong Sales & Marketing approach.
profile_positions.title: Project management

profile_positions.description:
European introduction and commercialization of a new unique innovative technique in Airdecontanimation. ( The Plasmer technique ).

AIRINSPACE was a start-up company in 2003 specializing in air decontamination (making the air free of viruses and bacteria) through an adapted core space technology to needs Healthcare and Transportation markets.

Primary focus: Implementation of a new brand platform in different indications at University and Military Hospitals, as well setting up a new distribution network Europe.
profile_positions.title: European Sales Director

profile_positions.description:
Building this start up company into a leading, inventive organization with 2 divisions Gho Clinic and Gho Pharma.

Gho Clinic, ( currently, Hair Science Institute ): became a leading R&D Company in hair restoration treatment. Clinic developed a new method of hairtransplantation, so called Follicle Transplantation.

Gho Pharma: Research & Development company in the medical fields of inflammation and secondary tissue injury, initiated by direct injury such as burns, ischemia and stroke.
profile_positions.title: CEO

profile_positions.description:
Pulsion a new German medical device company, specialized in intra thoracol volume measurement. ( lungwater ) 
The Pulsion technic has been successfully launched in the Netherlands. This new technique has lead to new insights in the treatment of seriously ill patients.
profile_positions.title: Managing Director Sales and marketing - The Netherlands

profile_positions.description:
Norian a new orthopedic start up company in biomaterials.
The mission was the establishment of new standards of care for skeletal repair  (Norian SRS – Skeletal Repair System).
	
As Manager Europe of Norian Corporation, I was accountable for Business Development and establishing the European commercialization of Norian SRS.
The strategy of the Head Office was heavily influenced and guided by the positive results achieved in Europe, what resulted in a sale to Synthes, a global player in Orthopedics.
